evidence.claim: BilliMD utilizes Amazon Web Services for its cloud infrastructure.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring the protection of patient data.
BilliMD supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration includes support for X12 EDI transactions for billing.
The use of AWS services ensures scalable and reliable application performance.

icp.icp_reason: BilliMD processes X12 EDI transactions and values API automation for healthcare data exchange.
